QuestData.Title: Darkened Clouds
QuestData.Description:
The Primalists have infected Windsong Rise with their nonsense teachings. Our kin there are foolish to entertain their ideas.
If we assist with clearing this sacred ground of their presence, perhaps the other clans will come to our aid in time of need. Do you think you could assist?
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear out the Primalist presence from Windsong Rise.
